parameters.name: Collection
parameters.description:
The name of the document collection.

> You can call the [CreateDocumentCollection](~~2618448~~) operation to create a document collection and call the [ListDocumentCollections](~~2618452~~) operation to query a list of document collections.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The cluster ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: EntityTypes
parameters.description:
The list of entity types.

> If the knowledge graph construction is enabled, this parameter is required.

parameters.name: LLMModel
parameters.description:
The name of the LLM model.

> Valid values:

*   knowledge-extract-standard: the default value.

*   knowledge-extract-mini

> This parameter takes effect only when the knowledge graph construction is enabled.

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description:
The language used to build the knowledge graph. Valid values:

*   Simplified Chinese. The default value.
*   English.

> This parameter takes effect only when the knowledge graph construction is enabled.

parameters.name: ManagerAccount
parameters.description:
The name of the privileged database account that has the rds_superuser permission.

> You can call the [CreateAccount](~~2361789~~) operation to create an account.

parameters.name: ManagerAccountPassword
parameters.description: The password for the privileged database account.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description:
The name of the namespace. Default value: public.

> You can call the CreateNamespace operation to create a namespace and call the ListNamespaces operation to query a list of namespaces.

parameters.name: NamespacePassword
parameters.description:
The password of the namespace.

> The value of this parameter is specified by [CreateNamespace](~~2401495~~) operation.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the cluster.

> You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~86912~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: RelationshipTypes
parameters.description:
The list of relationship edge types.

> If the knowledge graph construction is enabled, this parameter is required.
